messages.title: Back Nick Clegg and John Leech for real change
Liberal Democrats Shine
messages.content: Nick Clegg the Leader of the Liberal Democrats shining in the Prime Ministerial debate by parked far right Nick Griffin and the discredited Labour and Conservative Parties.

messages.title: John Leech & Nick Clegg are delivering for South Manchester
messages.content: John has been out fighting for the people, winning millions of investment in south Manchester as well as fighting for the good work the Liberal Democrats do and explaining how many ordinary people are now just beginning to realise.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Reversing school cutbacks and investing in our local schools and fighting for local services.
Help the vulnerable by standing up to rich and powerful interests who have far too much say over our lives.

politicalExperience.role: Member of Parliament for South Manchester
politicalExperience.achievements: John has been out fighting for the people, winning millions of investment in south Manchester.

endorsements.endorsement: I have always voted Labour, but after sitting in the audience and listening to Nick Clegg I am now going to be giving my vote to John Leech and the Liberal Democrats.

images.caption: As seen on Granada Reports tonight
